channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- shortcodes-ultimate-pro
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- shortcodes-ultimate-pro

item.title: CVE-2024-4217|2024-08-01T20:33:53.001Z -- unknown -- shortcodes-ultimate-pro
item.description: The shortcodes-ultimate-pro WordPress plugin before 7.1.5 does not properly escape some of its shortcodes' settings, making it possible for attackers with a Contributor account to conduct Stored XSS attacks.
